dict.string: - iPod Shuffle support (courtesy of a donation from patsyfreer). - New icon courtesy of einsteinbqat. - You can now love/ban/tag/recommend the currently playing track from the note menu. - The Top Lists profile now includes the number of tracks played per day and the number of hours played per day (as tooltips). - Bug Fix: Crash in version checker if an invalid XML file was downloaded.
